ColorShapeLinks AI
An AI competition for the IEEE Conference on Games
RandomAIThinker.cs
1 
9 using System;
10 using System.Threading;
11 
12 namespace ColorShapeLinks.Common.AI.Examples
13 {
17  public class RandomAIThinker : AbstractThinker
18  {
19  // A random number generator instance
20  private Random random;
21 
25  public RandomAIThinker()
26  {
27  random = new Random();
28  }
29 
32  public override FutureMove Think(Board board, CancellationToken ct)
33  {
34  // Check how many pieces current player has
35  int roundPieces = board.PieceCount(board.Turn, PShape.Round);
36  int squarePieces = board.PieceCount(board.Turn, PShape.Square);
37 
38  // Chose a random piece
39  int pieceRand = random.Next(roundPieces + squarePieces);
40  PShape shape = pieceRand < roundPieces
41  ? PShape.Round : PShape.Square;
42 
43  // Chose a random free position
44  int col;
45  do
46  {
47  // Get a random position
48  col = random.Next(board.cols);
49  // Is this task to be cancelled?
50  if (ct.IsCancellationRequested) return FutureMove.NoMove;
51  }
52  while (board.IsColumnFull(col));
53 
54  // Return the random move
55  return new FutureMove(col, shape);
56  }
57  }
58 }
ColorShapeLinks.Common.AI.AbstractThinker
The actual AI code of specific AIs should be placed in classes which extend this class.
